query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 «O tu che se’ di là dal fiume sacro», 2 volgendo suo parlare a me per punta, 3 che pur per taglio m’era paruto acro,
query.error: **English:** 1 "O you who are on the other side of the sacred river," 2 turning his speech to me with a point, 3 which even as a cut had seemed sharp to me,
query.result: 1 "Wahai kamu yang berada di seberang sungai suci," 2 mengalihkan pembicaraannya kepadaku dengan tajam, 3 yang bahkan sebagai luka tampak tajam bagiku,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 ricominciò, seguendo sanza cunta, 5 «dì, dì se questo è vero: a tanta accusa 6 tua confession conviene esser congiunta».
query.error: **English:** 4 he began again, continuing without delay, 5 "say, say if this is true: to such an accusation 6 your confession must be joined."
query.result: 4 dia mulai lagi, melanjutkan tanpa henti, 5 "katakan, katakan apakah ini benar: pengakuanmu 6 harus disertakan dengan tuduhan sebesar itu."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Era la mia virtù tanto confusa, 8 che la voce si mosse, e pria si spense 9 che da li organi suoi fosse dischiusa.
query.error: **English:** 7 My virtue was so bewildered, 8 that the voice moved, and then ceased 9 before it was released from its organs.
query.result: 7 Kebajikan-kebajikanku begitu membingungkan, 8 sehingga suara itu bergerak, dan kemudian berhenti 9 sebelum ia dilepaskan dari organ-organnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Poco sofferse; poi disse: «Che pense? 11 Rispondi a me; ché le memorie triste 12 in te non sono ancor da l’acqua offense».
query.error: **English:** 10 He suffered a little; then he said: "What are you thinking? 11 Answer me; for the sad memories 12 are not yet erased from your mind by the water".
query.result: 10 Dia menderita sedikit; kemudian dia berkata: "Apa yang kamu pikirkan? 11 Jawab aku; karena kenangan sedih 12 di dalam dirimu belum terhapus oleh air".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Confusione e paura insieme miste 14 mi pinsero un tal «sì» fuor de la bocca, 15 al quale intender fuor mestier le viste.
query.error: **English:** 13 Confusion and fear, mingled together, 14 forced such a "yes" from my mouth, 15 that to understand it, sight was necessary.
query.result: 13 Kekeliruan dan ketakutan, bercampur aduk 14 memaksaku untuk mengucapkan "ya" dari mulutku, 15 yang untuk memahaminya, penglihatan diperlukan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 16 Seperti busur panah yang patah, ketika dilepaskan 17 oleh tegangan yang terlalu kuat, tali dan busurnya, 18 dan dengan kekuatan yang lebih sedikit anak panah mencapai sasarannya,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 sì scoppia’ io sottesso grave carco, 20 fuori sgorgando lagrime e sospiri, 21 e la voce allentò per lo suo varco.
query.error: **English:** 19 so I burst beneath the heavy burden, 20 tears and sighs gushing forth, 21 and my voice weakened as it passed through my throat.
query.result: 19 begitulah aku meledak di bawah beban yang berat, 20 air mata dan desahan menyembur keluar, 21 dan suaraku melemah saat melewati tenggorokanku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 22 Kemudian dia berkata kepadaku: "Melalui hasratku, 23 yang menuntunmu untuk mencintai kebaikan 24 yang tidak ada lagi yang lebih baik darinya,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 quai fossi attraversati o quai catene 26 trovasti, per che del passare innanzi 27 dovessiti così spogliar la spene?
query.error: **English:** 25 what fords or what chains 26 did you find, that you had to strip yourself of hope 27 of passing onward in this way?
query.result: 25 apakah arungan atau rantai apa 26 yang kau temukan, sehingga kau harus menanggalkan harapan 27 untuk bisa terus maju dengan cara ini?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 E quali agevolezze o quali avanzi 29 ne la fronte de li altri si mostraro, 30 per che dovessi lor passeggiare anzi?».
query.error: **English:** 28 And what ease or what advantages 29 did you see in the faces of the others, 30 that you should have walked ahead of them?"
query.result: 28 Dan kemudahan atau keuntungan apa 29 yang kau lihat di wajah orang-orang lain, 30 sehingga kau harus berjalan di depan mereka?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Dopo la tratta d’un sospiro amaro, 32 a pena ebbi la voce che rispuose, 33 e le labbra a fatica la formaro.
query.error: **English:** 31 After the course of a bitter sigh, 32 I scarcely had the voice that answered, 33 and my lips formed it with difficulty.
query.result: 31 Setelah perjalanan desahan yang pahit, 32 aku nyaris tidak memiliki suara yang menjawab, 33 dan bibirku membentuknya dengan susah payah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Piangendo dissi: «Le presenti cose 35 col falso lor piacer volser miei passi, 36 tosto che ’l vostro viso si nascose».
query.error: **English:** 34 Weeping, I said: "The present things 35 with their false pleasure turned my steps, 36 as soon as your face was hidden."
query.result: 34 Menangis, kukatakan: "Hal-hal yang sekarang ini 35 dengan kesenangan palsunya telah mengubah langkahku, 36 segera setelah wajahmu tersembunyi."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Ma quando scoppia de la propria gota 41 l’accusa del peccato, in nostra corte 42 rivolge sé contra ’l taglio la rota.
query.error: **English:** 40 But when the accusation of sin bursts forth from its own drop, 41 in our court 42 the wheel turns itself against the blade.
query.result: 40 Tetapi ketika tuduhan dosa meledak dari tetesannya sendiri, 41 di pengadilan kita 42 roda itu membalikkan dirinya melawan bilahnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 Tuttavia, perché mo vergogna porte 44 del tuo errore, e perché altra volta, 45 udendo le serene, sie più forte,

query.result: 43 Namun, mengapa kamu menanggung malu 44 atas kesalahanmu, dan mengapa lain waktu, 45 mendengar sirene, jadilah lebih kuat,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 pon giù il seme del piangere e ascolta: 47 sì udirai come in contraria parte 48 mover dovieti mia carne sepolta.
query.error: **English:** 46 put down the seed of weeping and listen: 47 thus you will hear how in the opposite direction 48 you must move my buried flesh.
query.result: 46 letakkan benih tangisan dan dengarkan: 47 demikian kamu akan mendengar bagaimana ke arah yang berlawanan 48 kamu harus memindahkan dagingku yang terkubur.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 49 Nature or art never presented to you 50 a pleasure as great as the beautiful limbs in which I 51 was enclosed, and which are now scattered on the earth;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 e se ’l sommo piacer sì ti fallio 53 per la mia morte, qual cosa mortale 54 dovea poi trarre te nel suo disio?
query.error: **English:** 52 and if the supreme pleasure failed you so 53 because of my death, what mortal thing 54 could then draw you into its desire?
query.result: 52 dan jika kesenangan tertinggi itu gagal kau dapatkan 53 karena kematianku, hal fana apakah 54 yang kemudian dapat menarikmu ke dalam keinginannya?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Ben ti dovevi, per lo primo strale 56 de le cose fallaci, levar suso 57 di retro a me che non era più tale.
query.error: **English:** 55 You should have risen up 56 after the first arrow of deceptive things, 57 behind me, who was no longer such.
query.result: 55 Seharusnya engkau, karena panah pertama 56 dari hal-hal yang menipu, bangkit 57 di belakangku, yang tidak lagi seperti itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Non ti dovea gravar le penne in giuso, 59 ad aspettar più colpo, o pargoletta 60 o altra novità con sì breve uso.
query.error: **English:** 58 It should not have weighed down your wings, 59 to wait for another blow, oh fledgling, 60 or some other novelty with such brief experience.
query.result: 58 Tidak seharusnya membebani sayapmu ke bawah, 59 untuk menunggu pukulan lain, oh anak burung, 60 atau hal baru lainnya dengan pengalaman yang begitu singkat.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Di penter sì mi punse ivi l’ortica, 86 che di tutte altre cose qual mi torse 87 più nel suo amor, più mi si fé nemica.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 Tanta riconoscenza il cor mi morse, 89 ch’io caddi vinto; e quale allora femmi, 90 salsi colei che la cagion mi porse.

query.result: 88 Rasa terima kasih yang begitu besar menusuk hatiku, 89 sehingga aku jatuh tak berdaya; dan seperti apa keadaanku saat itu, 90 dialah yang menjadi penyebabnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Poi, quando il cor virtù di fuor rendemmi, 92 la donna ch’io avea trovata sola 93 sopra me vidi, e dicea: «Tiemmi, tiemmi!».
query.error: **English:** 91 Then, when my heart gave me strength again, 92 I saw the lady whom I had found alone 93 above me, and she said: "Hold me, hold me!"
query.result: 91 Kemudian, ketika hatiku memberiku kekuatan lagi, 92 wanita yang kutemukan sendirian itu 93 kulihat di atasku, dan berkata: "Pegang aku, pegang aku!"

query.prompt:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Mille disiri più che fiamma caldi 119 strinsermi li occhi a li occhi rilucenti, 120 che pur sopra ’l grifone stavan saldi.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 Come in lo specchio il sol, non altrimenti 122 la doppia fiera dentro vi raggiava, 123 or con altri, or con altri reggimenti.
